website_summaries.verdict: We recommend the CrownCoast for its overall performance and rugged construction.
pros: Has windproof memory frame and automatic open/close feature
Comes in numerous colors and patterns
Backed by a lifetime replacement guarantee
cons: Some testers found that the open/close button has the tendency to stick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money to me
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed by this umbrella. While I'm very happy that it still fits in my handbag, it's still a little bulky. This umbrella supposedly can fit two people under it, but it barely covers me and I'm tiny. If another person tried to shelter we would both get wet. While it is easy to open, that's not the case to close it. I have to push down very hard before it closes and that's not very convenient when it's raining and you're trying to get in a car. Lastly, the spokes have already started to rust and I've only had this umbrella a little over a month, and probably used it 3 times for the most.
customer_reviews.author: Windgoddess7

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these umbrellas to take with me to Ireland and they did not disappoint. They are sturdy enough for some wind gust and just wide enough to keep you dry in windy conditions. I also loved the feature of pushing the button to retract umbrella. It helped to shake excess water off before entering a building. All in all a very good product. Definitely an upgrade from your average dime store umbrella. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: A really sturdy umbrella that hasn't flipped inside out on me during high wind rainstorms, but has an awkward closing mechanism (you need both hands available to close it) and mine got a small rip in at the top after 3 months of use, during a crazy heavy rainstorm. Also not as wide as I would like, but gets the job done in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought one of these umbrellas last year, and loved it!!! It was great for the wind and rain in the Pacific Northwest. In December, I bought a second one for my 10 year old granddaughter. She uses it when it is raining when she walks to school. I just bought a third one to keep in my car for "emergencies." My feelings...this umbrella is easy to use, is sturdy enough to handle the wind and rain we get here in Washington state, and it works very well in keeping me dry. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Martin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: No stars at all! i only checked one Bauer I had to in order to send the review. Never wrote a bad review before but this really makes me angry! I purchased this back in March and used only 2 or 3 times because I had difficulty opening and closing. Pulled it out today to try again and it shot up the handle but wouldn’t open! Looks like some cord inside snapped so it’s dead! Now stuck in car during a downpour and late for appt. waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Clolita

customer_reviews.title: Durable...worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Durable, looks nice, worked well. Bought this for those rain and wind days as I've had too many umbrellas that just fail under any sort of stress. Also bought one for wife and son, they loved theirs. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganDad

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella and customer support EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best umbrella ever, great gift for family and friends! My rainbow umbrella is both fun and durable on my oft-windy and rainy commute. When my umbrella broke (from issue when closing it) I was heart-broken but I followed the customer service steps and it took a total of 2 days to have the exact same one delivered free of charge to my door. This is how both umbrella AND customer service should work! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this. You are throwing you're money away.
customer_reviews.text: Broke right away, don't buy this. Spend a little more money and get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella, been out in 3 storms with heavy winds and the umbrella flexed well and did not invert. This though the umbrella was almost pulled from my tight grip on many occasions due to the wind's force.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Codder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't rained since I purchased it. It is very solid while testing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: love the self-closing element
customer_reviews.text: love the self-closing element....very handy for getting on the bus. Bought one for a friend too....he loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Opening mechanism broke after only a few uses. Will not spring open.
customer_reviews.author: D. N. Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a recent trip to England
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for a recent trip to England. The instant open and close button/mechanism really works FAST so be prepared!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Tucson

customer_reviews.title: When it's raining, this is what you want
customer_reviews.text: Works well although the button to go up and down is sporadic
customer_reviews.author: gingersax

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella broke during the very first attempt to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella broke during the very first attempt to use it. It wouldn't fully open, and wouldn't close after being partially opened.
customer_reviews.author: Yury Braginsky

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: This is so skillfully engineered and manufactured that I expect it to give me several years of excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: bgude

customer_reviews.title: Super nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Super nice quality, haven't used it in the rain just yet, but upon delivery and inspection it sure does appear to be of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: David Knapp

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It's very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's very easy to use. I like the umbrella I got the gun metal gray color. I used it once already with medium wind and it has hold up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not all that tough
customer_reviews.text: One of the points already bent and disconnected from the main part of its arm.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved, it really does keep the rain & wind away.
customer_reviews.author: SURVIVOR69

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super Rainy Day, umbrella never opened. I was stuck. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Mysty

customer_reviews.title: Worked, then the top popped off
customer_reviews.text: No wind, a little rain, opened up the umbrella and the top seal came off. Got me to the car, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Capt618

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best umbrella I've ever owned. I love the auto close feature.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great - at first...
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: this typically sits in a special compartment, made for an umbrella, on my work backpack. It doesn't get a ton of use... but there are holes where the metal meets the fabric. Seems sturdy. Great zipper case!
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a backup but had to use today and it worked extremely well. Wind did not seem to blow me around and it kept rain off as expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Can't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Button on handle to extend umbrella dead on arrival. Returned, bought a Totes. The Totes is great.
customer_reviews.author: OIBDow

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of these umbrellas, while the two ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these umbrellas, while the two work okay, 1 of them I opened months later and found out it came broken
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella broke
customer_reviews.text: After less than 5 uses the umbrella is broke, water drips in from the middle of the umbrella becuase the material has come off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella performs in all of the "protection" benefits as stated in the product description. It opens surprisingly quick. The down side is the umbrella is horrible to collapse back to it's designed compact size. The couple of times I used this umbrella left me struggling to close the dripping wet umbrella. You have to physically force the umbrella crown and shaft down into a collapsed position. Let's face it, it's very hard to do. Women will especially have a difficult time closing it. Pass this one by and choose another.
customer_reviews.author: mscrim

customer_reviews.title: Seller Stands by Product
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is very sturdy and works as expected. It deploys pretty effortlessly. When the umbrella failed over time, I contacted the seller and got an immediate response and a very fast replacement. GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Skillset

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: First one that I got came in and it was broken. The umbrella would not open up at all. I ordered a replacement so let's see if the second time is the charm.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy open and close. Holds up in heavy rain and wind.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

product_meta.title: Crown Coast 60 MPH Wind Proof Travel Umbrella
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :10.9 x 1.6 x 1.6 inches; 12.96 Ounces
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :December 14, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Crown Coast
 * ASIN :B01N1SEN1H

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #137,949 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #9 inSports Fan Luggage 
    *  #288 inStick Umbrellas 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:3.3 out of 5 stars45 ratings
feature_bullets: ☂POWERFUL 10-RIB SYMMETRY MORE RIBS EQUAL MORE STABILITY☂ 10-Rib Flex Memory Frame Technology Makes This The Strongest Windproof Travel Umbrella On The Market Today. Most Umbrellas Are Typically Destroyed When They Are Flipped Inside Out. Crown Coast Umbrellas Are Designed Differently To Be Flexible. Proven To Resist 65+ MPH Gusts, If The Umbrella Canopy Does Flip Inside Out, The Resilient Frame Simply Bounces Back Unbroken To Its Normal Shape Time After Time.

☂DELUXE ZIPPER CASE WITH MICROFIBER WIPE☂ A Deluxe Microfiber Wipe Is Included In The Snap Pouch On A Deluxe Zipper Case For Wiping Off Excess Water. Easy to Carry And Compact Measuring In At 11.3 Inches Long Makes This One Of The Best Rain Umbrellas For Woman To Own Because It Stores Easily In Purses And Backpacks And At A Weight Of Less Than 15 Ounces Makes This A Super Lightweight Umbrella Kids Can Use.

☂AUTOMATIC OPEN & CLOSE 10-RIB CANOPY☂ Patented Synthetic Polymer Canopy. Waterproof And Quick Drying The Canopy Is Non-Absorbent, Abrasion Resistant, Mold And Mildew Resistant. Auto Open Offers Instant Cover From Rain With An Impressive Fast & Snappy Opening Action. Auto Close Is Handy For Quick Entry Into A Car, Building Or Tent. One Button Handle Operation Gives You The Capability To Easily Carry Items With Your Other Hand.

☂FAT GRIP HANDLE, LOW TENSION RELOAD SPRING☂ A Single Open/Close Button Set In A Stylish Pliable Non-Slip Rubber Comfort Fat Grip Handle With An Attached Elastic Looped Wristlet For Easy Carrying. Anti-Corrosion Three-Fold Electroplated Frame To Prevent Rust. Low Tension Reload Spring For Easy Closing Of The Telescoping Handle To Compact Position.

☂ZERO-RISK 90 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE☂ If you are unhappy with your purchase we will refund you the purchase price, no questions asked this is zero risk to you. Click Add To Cart. Buy Now. Thank You For Your Purchase.
